titulo: Today's Dune: Awakening patch notes are as long as a sandworm, with more than 300 changes, bug fixes, and squashed exploits
descricao: NewsChanges include adjustments to 'thopter speed and those annoying antigravity bubbles, plus it's now easier to jump into a vehicle when you're panicking.

titulo: Blizzard ends new content development for Warcraft Rumble and lays off staff: Former employee says 'most' of the team has been let go
descricao: newsWarcraft Rumble will continue to operate with in-game events and bug fixes, but further development is over.

titulo: Phil Spencer retirement rumor is made up, says Microsoft
descricao: newsThe Xbox head is not stepping down "anytime soon."

titulo: EA reportedly expects Battlefield 6 to bring in 100 million players, a number that even DICE devs don't think is feasible
descricao: NEWSA new report says Battlefield 6 development has been more expensive than planned, and the campaign is way behind schedule.

titulo: French court finds 3 former Ubisoft executives guilty of workplace harassment
descricao: NewsThe sentencing of ex-Ubisoft bosses arrives five years after the onset of its toxic workplace scandal.

titulo: The Elder Scrolls Online director Matt Firor, who helped launch ZeniMax Online Studios in 2007, is leaving the company
descricao: newsWord of Firor's surprise departure came just hours after Microsoft announced the layoff of 9,000 employees.
